mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_TIMELINE_COMMENT(time_comm_no, time_no, time_comm_content, user_no) VALUES(TIME_COMM_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{timeNo}, #{timeCommContent}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name, tc.time_comm_no, tc.time_no, tc.user_no, tc.time_comm_content, tc.time_comm_create_dt FROM TBL_TIMELINE_COMMENT tc JOIN TBL_USER u ON tc.user_no = u.user_no WHERE tc.time_no = #{timeNo} ORDER BY tc.time_comm_no DESC
